General.Name: Hubei Feilihua Quartz Glass Co Ltd
General.Description: Hubei Feilihua Quartz Glass Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells quartz material and quartz fiber products worldwide. Its products are used in fields, such as aviation and aerospace, semiconductor, fine machining, optical fiber communication, optics, etc. Hubei Feilihua Quartz Glass Co., Ltd. was founded in 1966 and is based in Jingzhou, China.
